source:
<!--
## Introduction

The [`amp-facebook-like`](/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-facebook-like-v0.1.md) component allows embedding Facebook like button into AMP files.
--><!-- -->
<!doctype html>
<html ⚡>
<head>
<meta charset="utf-8">
<title>amp-facebook-like</title>
<script async src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0.js"></script>
<!-- ## Setup -->
<!-- Import the `amp-facebook-like` component to add a like button-->
<script async custom-element="amp-facebook-like" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-facebook-like-0.1.js"></script>
<link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/components/amp-facebook-like/index.html">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
<style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
</head>
<body>

<!-- ## Basic usage -->
<!-- You can use the `amp-facebook-like` component to embed the [Facebook like button plugin](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/plugins/like-button).
For the list of supported layouts and attributes you can refer to the [documentation](/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-facebook-like-v0.1.md) -->
<amp-facebook-like width="110" height="20" layout="fixed" data-layout="button_count" data-href="https://www.facebook.com/testesmegadivertidos/">
</amp-facebook-like>
</body></html>

sections.doc_:
## Introduction

The [`amp-facebook-like`](/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-facebook-like-v0.1.md) component allows embedding Facebook like button into AMP files.
sections.cachedMarkedDoc:
Introduction

The amp-facebook-like component allows embedding Facebook like button into AMP files.
sections.normalizedDoc_:
## Introduction

The [`amp-facebook-like`](/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-facebook-like-v0.1.md) component allows embedding Facebook like button into AMP files.

sections.doc_: Import the `amp-facebook-like` component to add a like button

sections.doc_:
You can use the `amp-facebook-like` component to embed the [Facebook like button plugin](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/plugins/like-button).
For the list of supported layouts and attributes you can refer to the [documentation](/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-facebook-like-v0.1.md)
sections.normalizedDoc_:
You can use the `amp-facebook-like` component to embed the [Facebook like button plugin](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/plugins/like-button).
For the list of supported layouts and attributes you can refer to the [documentation](/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-facebook-like-v0.1.md)
